transcend.4_1: ATK DEF HP +16%\n+5% Ally Team Defense\n+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6: ATK DEF HP +30%\n+5% Ally Team Defense\n+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Rose Slash
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies with Heavy Strike.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.
description: Attacks 2 enemies with Heavy Strike.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Tidal Wave
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies with Heavy Strike and recovers Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and additionally increases inversely proportional to the number of targets.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\n+2 turns Reduced Defense duration\n+2 Weakness Gauge damage

description: Attacks all enemies with Heavy Strike and recovers Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000008_2_2]</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and additionally increases inversely proportional to the number of targets.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: End of the World
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies with Heavy Strike and inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and additionally increases inversely proportional to the number of targets.
description: Attacks all enemies with Heavy Strike and inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000008_3_3] turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and additionally increases inversely proportional to the number of targets.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Increases Skill Chain damage of all allies. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health</color>. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.
